text: Neues Budapester Abendblatt was a liberal German-language daily newspaper, published from Budapest. The last issue of the newspaper was published on January 7, 1922.http://icon.crl.edu/detail.php?language=Hungarian&country;=&title;=&begindate;=&sort;=place&sortOrder;=ASC&recCount;=168&item;=-1&recIndex;=45 == References == Category:Mass media in Austria-Hungary Category:Newspapers published in Budapest Category:German-language newspapers published in Hungary Category:History of Budapest Category:Defunct newspapers published in Hungary Category:Publications disestablished in 1922 Category:Publications with year of establishment missing Category:Daily newspapers published in Hungary
title: Neues Budapester Abendblatt
